page.title: 13MY LOCAL AREA
page.content: My name is Sarah and I am 10 years old.I live on the border between Sunningdale and Ascot.This area is famous for horse racing and it becomes extemely busy when there is a race meeting. I like this area because it is very quiet most of the time.It is an ideal place for bird watching,painting and other quiet hobbies. I think though that this area is bad for shopping.The shops are far away and quite expensive.I feel that there aren't enough playing fields and swimming pools in the area.There are not enough things to entertain people and the bus service is very infrequent.
